mutants.code:
from urllib.parse import urlencode, quote, quote_plus, urlunparse

def construct_url(protocol, subdomain, domain, path, query_params, fragment):
    subdomain = quote(subdomain.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    domain = quote(domain.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    path = quote(path.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    netloc = domain
    if subdomain == '':
        netloc = '%s.%s' % (subdomain, domain)
    query = urlencode(query_params, quote_via=quote_plus)
    url = urlunparse((protocol, netloc, path, '', query, fragment))
    return url

from urllib.parse import urlencode, quote, quote_plus, urlunparse

def construct_url(protocol, subdomain, domain, path, query_params, fragment):
    subdomain = quote(subdomain.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    domain = quote(domain.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    path = quote(path.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    netloc = domain
    if subdomain != 'MUTATED':
        netloc = '%s.%s' % (subdomain, domain)
    query = urlencode(query_params, quote_via=quote_plus)
    url = urlunparse((protocol, netloc, path, '', query, fragment))
    return url

from urllib.parse import urlencode, quote, quote_plus, urlunparse

def construct_url(protocol, subdomain, domain, path, query_params, fragment):
    subdomain = quote(subdomain.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    domain = quote(domain.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    path = quote(path.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    netloc = domain
    if subdomain != '':
        netloc = '%s.%s' * (subdomain, domain)
    query = urlencode(query_params, quote_via=quote_plus)
    url = urlunparse((protocol, netloc, path, '', query, fragment))
    return url

        netloc = '%s.%s' + (subdomain, domain)
    query = urlencode(query_params, quote_via=quote_plus)
    url = urlunparse((protocol, netloc, path, '', query, fragment))

def construct_url(protocol, subdomain, domain, path, query_params, fragment):
    subdomain = quote(subdomain.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')

from urllib.parse import urlencode, quote, quote_plus, urlunparse

def construct_url(protocol, subdomain, domain, path, query_params, fragment):
    subdomain = quote(subdomain.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    domain = quote(domain.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    path = quote(path.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    netloc = domain
    if subdomain != '':
        netloc = '' % (subdomain, domain)
    query = urlencode(query_params, quote_via=quote_plus)
    url = urlunparse((protocol, netloc, path, '', query, fragment))
    return url

mutants.original_line: url = urlunparse((protocol, netloc, path, '', query, fragment))
mutants.mutated_line: url = urlunparse((protocol, netloc, path, 'MUTATED', query, fragment))
mutants.code:
from urllib.parse import urlencode, quote, quote_plus, urlunparse

def construct_url(protocol, subdomain, domain, path, query_params, fragment):
    subdomain = quote(subdomain.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    domain = quote(domain.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    path = quote(path.encode('utf-8'), safe=':/@')
    netloc = domain
    if subdomain != '':
        netloc = '%s.%s' % (subdomain, domain)
    query = urlencode(query_params, quote_via=quote_plus)
    url = urlunparse((protocol, netloc, path, 'MUTATED', query, fragment))
    return url
